meta.name: Screenshot Maker
meta.tagline: Takes screenshots for the moonlight README
meta.description:
Usage instructions:

- Reset your config, rename `extensions`, etc. to not load any other extensions (make sure to not add the entire dist folder too!)
- Enable Platform Styles with the style set to "web"
- Ensure you are scrolled to the top of the settings window, there aren't any carets in the search bars, and Moonbase is at the top with no custom extensions showing
- Take two screenshots by pressing `Alt+Ctrl+M`, one in light mode and one in dark mode
- Ship it
